channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former NASCAR Driver Greg Biffle, Family Members Among 7 Killed in Plane Crash
item.description: Former race driver Greg Biffle and members of his family were among seven people who died in a plane crash Thursday in North Carolina, state police sa...

item.title: Finally, Ben Johnson and his Bears Have Earned Bettors' R-E-S-P-E-C-T
item.description: The Bears-Packers matchup? It's currently a pick 'em — meaning Chicago is getting its long overdue respect. Sammy P discusses that and more.

item.title: 10 Burning Questions Still Waiting To Be Answered After MLB Winter Meetings
item.description: Here are 10 burning questions from FOX Sports' MLB reporters Deesha Thosar and Rowan Kavner that, when answered, will make the stove sizzle.

item.title: Is Lamar Jackson’s inability to stay healthy costing the Ravens? | First Things First
item.description: Lamar Jackson missed practice with “a flu like deal” ahead of the Baltimore Ravens’ matchup with the New England Patriots. Nick Wright, Chris Broussar...

item.title: Luis Arraez? Re-Sign Eugenio Suarez? 3 MLB Free Agents Mariners Should Sign
item.description: The Seattle Mariners have established themselves as World Series contenders; here are three MLB free agents they should sign.

item.title: Muschamp returns as Horns fire DC Kwiatkowski
item.description: Will Muschamp is returning to Texas as defensive coordinator after coach Steve Sarkisian fired DC Pete Kwiatkowski and defensive passing game coordina...

item.title: Student-athlete: Commanders LB Bobby Wagner graduating with MBA from Howard University
item.description: The Washington Commanders linebacker received his MBA from the historically Black university while being a fully active player.

item.title: Ex-NASCAR driver Biffle, family die in plane crash
item.description: Former NASCAR driver Greg Biffle, his family and three others were among seven people killed in a plane crash Thursday in Statesville, N.C.

item.title: WNBPA members vote to strike 'when necessary'
item.description: The WNBPA announced Thursday that its members have voted overwhelmingly to authorize calling a strike "when necessary" during the ongoing negotiations...
